import Example from './../../../../../guideline-app/app/ui/components/example/Example';
import Alertstripe from 'nav-frontend-alertstriper';
import { FnrInput } from './../../';

import FnrInputExample from './../../sample/_fnr-input.example.js';

Komponenten bruker [@navikt/fnrvalidator](https://github.com/navikt/fnrvalidator) internt for å validere brukers input.

<Example>
    <FnrInputExample />
</Example>

```jsx
<FnrInput
    label="Fødselsnummer (11 siffer)"
    bredde="S"
    value={this.state.value}
    onChange={(e) => this.setState({value: e.target.value})}
    onValidate={(valid) => this.setState({ valid })}
    feil={(this.state.valid || !this.state.value ? undefined : 'Ugyldig fødselsnummer')}
/>
```
